sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b9fdd0a337301200455726877e41f133
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>planned_task</collection><condition>(PMPropertiesUtil.isCostRollUp(current.getTableName()) == 'true' ) && (current.cost.changes() || current.parent.changes() || current.operation() == "delete")</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Planned Task Estimated Cost Rollup</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	var isProjectOrProjectTask = current.instanceOf('pm_project') || current.instanceOf('pm_project_task');
	if(!isProjectOrProjectTask)
		return;

	var entityUpdater = new PlannedTaskEntityUpdater();

	if(!current.parent.nil()) {		
		var parent = new GlideRecord('planned_task');
		if (parent.get(current.parent))
			entityUpdater.updatePlannedTaskEstimatedCost(parent);
	}
	
	if(current.parent.changes() && !previous.parent.nil()) {
		var prevParent = new GlideRecord('planned_task');
		if (prevParent.get(previous.parent))
			entityUpdater.updatePlannedTaskEstimatedCost(prevParent);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-12 19:37:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b9fdd0a337301200455726877e41f133</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Planned Task Estimated Cost Rollup</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">c7c742bf6f390200d45331012e3ee496</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b9fdd0a337301200455726877e41f133</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-28 18:28:23</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b9fdd0a337301200455726877e41f133"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6b7de0fddbc623006bb976740f961945
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>planned_task</collection><condition>(PMPropertiesUtil.isCostRollUp(current.getTableName()) == 'true' ) && (current.work_cost.changes() || current.operation() == "delete")</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="planned_task">parentISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Project Actual Cost Rollup</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[calcCost();

function calcCost() {
	var isProjectOrProjectTask = current.instanceOf('pm_project') || current.instanceOf('pm_project_task') || current.instanceOf('u_tracked_task');
	if(!isProjectOrProjectTask)
		return;
	
	var parent = new GlideRecord('planned_task');
	if (!parent.get(current.parent))
		return;
	var childWorkCost = 0;
	if (gs.getProperty("glide.cost_mgmt.process_task_top_task") != "true" || (current.parent != current.top_task)) {
		var sibling = new GlideAggregate('planned_task');
		sibling.addQuery('parent', current.parent);
		sibling.query();
		
		
		while(sibling.next()){
			childWorkCost+= parseFloat(sibling.getValue("work_cost"));
		}
		
		if (isNaN(childWorkCost))
			childWorkCost = 0;
	}
	
	var parentExpenseCost = 0; // default
	// if we are getting costs from expense lines, include the parent's expenses
	// just in case
	// requires the cost management plugin
	//check for expense table just in case
	var tu = new TableUtils("fm_expense_line");
	if (tu.tableExists() && gs.getProperty("glide.cost_mgmt.calc_actual_cost") == "true") {
		var exp = new GlideAggregate("fm_expense_line");
		exp.addQuery("source_table", parent.sys_class_name);
		exp.addQuery("source_id", current.parent);
		exp.addQuery("state", "processed");
		exp.query();
		while (exp.next())
			parentExpenseCost+= parseFloat(exp.getValue("amount"));
		
		if (isNaN(parentExpenseCost))
			parentExpenseCost = 0;
	}
	var parentUpdate = false;
	parentChildActual = parseFloat(childWorkCost + parentExpenseCost);
	// actual cost field
	if (parent.work_cost != parentChildActual) {
		parent.work_cost = parentChildActual;
		parentUpdate = true;
	}
	
	if (parentUpdate)
		parent.update();
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-28 18:29:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6b7de0fddbc623006bb976740f961945</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Project Actual Cost Rollup</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6b7de0fddbc623006bb976740f961945</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-28 18:30:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6b7de0fddbc623006bb976740f961945"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ecd672dc9f100300598a5bb0657fcf28
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>planned_task</collection><condition>current.instanceOf('pm_project') || current.instanceOf('pm_project_task')</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="planned_task">work_startVALCHANGES^ORwork_endVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_start" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_end" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update State On Actuals - Projects</name><order>45</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var stateUtil = new PlannedTaskStateUtil(current);
	if ( current.work_start.changes() && (stateUtil.isStateOpen(current.state) || stateUtil.isStatePending(current.state)) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
	if ( current.work_start.changes() && JSUtil.nil(current.work_start) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
	if ( current.work_end.changes() && !stateUtil.isStateInactive(current.state) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
	if ( current.work_end.changes() && JSUtil.nil(current.work_end) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
})(current, previous);

function handleActualDateChange(gr) {
	var stateChangeOnActualsHandler = new PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler(gr);
    stateChangeOnActualsHandler.processActualDateChanges();
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-27 20:28:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ecd672dc9f100300598a5bb0657fcf28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update State On Actuals - Projects</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">c7c742bf6f390200d45331012e3ee496</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ecd672dc9f100300598a5bb0657fcf28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-28 18:22:29</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ecd672dc9f100300598a5bb0657fcf28"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>planned_task</collection><condition>current.instanceOf("pm_project") || current.instanceOf("pm_project_task") || current.instanceOf("u_tracked_task")</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="planned_task">start_dateVALCHANGES^ORparentVALCHANGES^ORdurationVALCHANGES^parentISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="duration" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate Start date for Child Task</name><order>101</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[validateStartDate();

function validateStartDate(){	
	var api = new SNC.PlannedTaskAPI();	
	
	var topTask = current.getValue('top_task');
	if ( current.parent.changes() )
		topTask = current.parent.top_task;
	
	var valid = api.isTaskStartDateValidForProject(topTask, current.getValue('duration'), current.getValue('start_date'));
	if ( valid == 'false' ) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Invalid project duration'));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		return;
	}	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-28 18:24:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ac5cec7ddbc623006bb976740f961904</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Start date for Child Task</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ac5cec7ddbc623006bb976740f961904</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-28 18:25:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ac5cec7ddbc623006bb976740f961904"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>planned_task</collection><condition>current.instanceOf('pm_project') || current.instanceOf('pm_project_task') || current.instanceOf('u_tracked_task')</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="planned_task">work_startVALCHANGES^ORwork_endVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_start" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_end" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update State On Actuals - Projects</name><order>45</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var stateUtil = new PlannedTaskStateUtil(current);
	if ( current.work_start.changes() && (stateUtil.isStateOpen(current.state) || stateUtil.isStatePending(current.state)) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
	if ( current.work_start.changes() && JSUtil.nil(current.work_start) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
	if ( current.work_end.changes() && !stateUtil.isStateInactive(current.state) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
	if ( current.work_end.changes() && JSUtil.nil(current.work_end) )
		handleActualDateChange(current);
})(current, previous);

function handleActualDateChange(gr) {
	var stateChangeOnActualsHandler = new PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler(gr);
    stateChangeOnActualsHandler.processActualDateChanges();
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-28 18:22:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8ddb24bddbc623006bb976740f96198f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update State On Actuals - Projects</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8ddb24bddbc623006bb976740f96198f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-28 18:23:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8ddb24bddbc623006bb976740f96198f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_95931134c3732100fd577bfaa2d3ae6f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AjaxCreateRelatedEntityFromDemand</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Ajax utility to to create the related entity from a Demand based on the type</description><name>AjaxCreateRelatedEntityFromDemand</name><script><![CDATA[var AjaxCreateRelatedEntityFromDemand = Class.create();
AjaxCreateRelatedEntityFromDemand.prototype =
Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    createProject: function(sys_id, resultAsObject) {
        sys_id = sys_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
        var result = (new DemandToProjectCreationHelper()).createProject(sys_id);
        return this._inExpectedFormat(result, resultAsObject);
    },
    
    createEnhancement: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var enhancement;
        var enhancementId;
        var enhancementNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
		
        if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.snc.sdlc.scrum")) {
            gs.log("Error creating Enhancement : SDLC - SCRUM plugin is not active");
            return;
        }
        
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error creating demand");
            return;
        }
        
        enhancement = new GlideRecord('rm_enhancement');
        enhancement.initialize();
        enhancement.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
        //enhancement.setValue("parent", demand.sys_id);
		enhancement.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
		if (!JSUtil.nil(demand.u_product)) enhancement.setValue("product", demand.u_product);
        enhancementId = enhancement.insert();
        enhancementNumber = enhancement.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = enhancement.getClassDisplayValue();
        
		//Copy any requirements associated with the Demand.
		var reqGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_requirement');
		reqGR.addQuery('parent', demand.sys_id);
		reqGR.query();
		while (reqGR.next()) {
			var originalId = reqGR.getUniqueValue();
			reqGR.setValue('parent', enhancementId);
			var newNumber = new NumberManager('dmn_requirement');
			reqGR.setValue('number', newNumber.getNextObjNumberPadded());
			var newId = reqGR.insert();
			GlideSysAttachment.copy('dmn_requirement', originalId, 'dmn_requirement', newId);
		}
		
		//Connect the user stories for the Demand to the newly-created Enhancement
		var storyGR = new GlideRecord('rm_story');
		storyGR.addQuery('demand', demand.sys_id);
		storyGR.query();
		while (storyGR.next()) {
			storyGR.setValue('enhancement', enhancementId);
			storyGR.update();
		}
        
        //update demand with enhancement details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = enhancementId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + enhancementId;
        
        demand.enhancement = enhancementId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'enhancement';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': enhancementId, 'number' : enhancementNumber, 'label' : tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
    
    createChange: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var change;
        var changeId;
        var changeNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
        
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error creating demand");
            return;
        }
        
        change = new GlideRecord('change_request');
        change.initialize();
        change.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
        change.setValue("parent", demand.sys_id);
		change.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
        changeId = change.insert();
        changeNumber = change.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = change.getClassDisplayValue();
        
        //update demand with change details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = changeId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + changeId;
        
        demand.change = changeId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'change';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': changeId, 'number' : changeNumber, 'label' :tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
    
    createDefect: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var defect;
        var defectId;
        var defectNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
		
        if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.snc.sdlc.scrum")) {
            gs.log("Error creating Defect : SDLC - SCRUM plugin is not active");
            return;
        }
        
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error creating demand");
            return;
        }
        
        defect = new GlideRecord('rm_defect');
        defect.initialize();
        defect.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
        defect.setValue("parent", demand.sys_id);
		defect.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
		if (!JSUtil.nil(demand.u_product)) defect.setValue('product', demand.u_product);
        defectId = defect.insert();
        defectNumber = defect.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = defect.getClassDisplayValue();
        
		//Copy any requirements associated with the Demand.
		var reqGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_requirement');
		reqGR.addQuery('parent', demand.sys_id);
		reqGR.query();
		while (reqGR.next()) {
			var originalId = reqGR.getUniqueValue();
			reqGR.setValue('parent', defectId);
			var newNumber = new NumberManager('dmn_requirement');
			reqGR.setValue('number', newNumber.getNextObjNumberPadded());
			var newId = reqGR.insert();
			GlideSysAttachment.copy('dmn_requirement', originalId, 'dmn_requirement', newId);
		}
		
		//Connect the user stories for the Demand to the newly-created Defect
		var storyGR = new GlideRecord('rm_story');
		storyGR.addQuery('demand', demand.sys_id);
		storyGR.query();
		while (storyGR.next()) {
			storyGR.setValue('defect', defectId);
			storyGR.update();
		}

        //update demand with defect details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = defectId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + defectId;
        
        demand.defect = defectId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'defect';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': defectId, 'number' : defectNumber, 'label' : tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
    
    fetchDemandEntityDetails: function() {
        var demand = this._getDemand(this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        var demandEntityDetails = {};
        var choiceGr;
        var entityType;
        var response;
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error fetching demand with sys_id:"+sys_id);
            return;
        }
        choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
        choiceGr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
        choiceGr.addQuery('element', 'type');
        choiceGr.query();
        while(choiceGr.next()){
            entityType =  choiceGr.getValue('value');
            demandEntityDetails[entityType] = demand.getValue(entityType);
        }
        demandEntityDetails.sys_id = demand.getValue('sys_id');
        demandEntityDetails.short_description = demand.getValue('short_description');
        demandEntityDetails.type = demand.getValue('type');
        demandEntityDetails.label = demand.getDisplayValue('type');
        response = this._JSONEncode(demandEntityDetails);
        
        return response;
    },
    
    _getDemand: function(sys_id) {
        var demand = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
        if (demand.get(sys_id))
            return demand;
        
        return null;
    },
    
    _inExpectedFormat: function(obj, resultAsObject) {
        return (resultAsObject) ? obj : this._JSONEncode(obj);
    },
    
    _JSONEncode: function(obj) {
        return (new JSON()).encode(obj);
    },
    
    type:'AjaxCreateRelatedEntityFromDemand'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-10-14 01:03:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>95931134c3732100fd577bfaa2d3ae6f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>147</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AjaxCreateRelatedEntityFromDemand</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">db6982ff6f390200d45331012e3ee4de</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_95931134c3732100fd577bfaa2d3ae6f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-23 20:27:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Ajax utility to to create a related entity from a Demand based on the user-defined type. This script extends the vendor-provided Demand Management utility script.</description><name>AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand</name><script><![CDATA[var AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand = Class.create();
AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    createTrackedTask: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var trackedTask;
        var trackedTaskId;
        var trackedTaskNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
		
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error retrieving demand");
            return;
        }
        
        trackedTask = new GlideRecord('u_tracked_task');
        trackedTask.initialize();
        trackedTask.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
		trackedTask.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
        trackedTaskId = trackedTask.insert();
        trackedTaskNumber = trackedTask.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = trackedTask.getClassDisplayValue();
        
        //update demand with task details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = trackedTaskId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + trackedTaskId;
        
        demand.u_task = trackedTaskId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'task';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': trackedTaskId, 'number' : trackedTaskNumber, 'label' : tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
    
	createCustomerServiceRequest: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var csr;
        var csrId;
        var csrNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
        
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error creating demand");
            return;
        }
        
        csr = new GlideRecord('task');
        csr.initialize();
        csr.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
        csr.setValue("parent", demand.sys_id);
		csr.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
        csrId = csr.insert();
        csrNumber = csr.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = csr.getClassDisplayValue();
        
        //update demand with csr details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = csrId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + csrId;
        
        demand.u_csr = csrId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'csr';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': csrId, 'number' : csrNumber, 'label' :tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
    
    fetchDemandEntityDetails: function() {
        var demand = this._getDemand(this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        var demandEntityDetails = {};
        var choiceGr;
        var entityType;
        var response;
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error fetching demand with sys_id:"+sys_id);
            return;
        }
        choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
        choiceGr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
        choiceGr.addQuery('element', 'type');
        choiceGr.query();
        while(choiceGr.next()){
            entityType =  choiceGr.getValue('value');
            demandEntityDetails[entityType] = demand.getValue(entityType);
        }
        demandEntityDetails.sys_id = demand.getValue('sys_id');
        demandEntityDetails.short_description = demand.getValue('short_description');
        demandEntityDetails.type = demand.getValue('type');
        demandEntityDetails.label = demand.getDisplayValue('type');
        response = this._JSONEncode(demandEntityDetails);
        
        return response;
    },
    
    _getDemand: function(sys_id) {
        var demand = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
        if (demand.get(sys_id))
            return demand;
        
        return null;
    },
    
    _inExpectedFormat: function(obj, resultAsObject) {
        return (resultAsObject) ? obj : this._JSONEncode(obj);
    },
    
    _JSONEncode: function(obj) {
        return (new JSON()).encode(obj);
    },

    type: 'AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-07 14:49:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>807e3955dbb357006bb976740f961916</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_807e3955dbb357006bb976740f961916</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-28 13:53:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
